name: Jousting Dreams
description:
Your dream has always been to become a jousting knight! Now is the time to live the dream!

Move the knight using the arrow keys left and right, Dodge the bushes, rocks and logs in your way as you charge towards your opponent. Hit your opponent with more health than him to win and become the knight you have always dreamed of becoming!

Made for the MiniJam18 with the Dream theme and 3 colors limitation. I added my own 64x64 limit challenge to make it more interesting and test myself.

The game is very small  and will probably not be playable by a lot of people but that was the limitation I imposed on myself.

All content was made by Pieter Algera.
